repnme.cdata!:
West Pakistan - Second Sui Northern Gas
            Pipelines Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would provide most of
            the foreign exchange costs of expanding the capacity of
            SNGPL's transmission system to meet the natural gas
            requirements of a new fertilizer plant in Lahore, and of
            providing additional distribution facilities in various
            urban areas in West Pakistan.
